Package com.github.actionfx.core.bind

Class MappingBasedBindingTargetResolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.actionfx.core.bind.AbstractCachingBindingTargetResolver
      • com.github.actionfx.core.bind.NameBasedBindindTargetResolver
        • com.github.actionfx.core.bind.MappingBasedBindingTargetResolver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindingTargetResolver
    public class MappingBasedBindingTargetResolver
extends NameBasedBindindTargetResolver
    Implementation of a BindingTargetResolver that uses an internal mapping for field names (also nested fields are supported) to control IDs for resolving to a control.

    In case there is no explicit mapping specified, the control can be looked up by matching the field name.

    Author:
    koster

    • Constructor Detail

      • MappingBasedBindingTargetResolver

        public MappingBasedBindingTargetResolver​(boolean disableNameBasedMapping)
        Constructor allowing to disable/enable the name-based mapping as fallback.

        Please note that you need to call registerMapping(String, ControlProperties, String) after instance creation for registering new mappings in this instance.

        Parameters:
        disableNameBasedMapping - If set to true, all mappings are solely taken from fieldToControlMap. If set to false, name-based resolution is applied as fallback.

      • MappingBasedBindingTargetResolver

        public MappingBasedBindingTargetResolver​(boolean disableNameBasedMapping,
                                         java.lang.String controlPrefix,
                                         java.lang.String controlSuffix)
        Constructor allowing to disable/enable the name-based mapping as fallback, plus a control prefix or suffix for resolution.

        Please note that you need to call registerMapping(String, ControlProperties, String) after instance creation for registering new mappings in this instance.

        Parameters:
        disableNameBasedMapping - If set to true, all mappings are solely taken from fieldToControlMap. If set to false, name-based resolution is applied as fallback.
        controlPrefix - a control prefix
        controlSuffix - a control suffix

    • Method Detail

      • registerMapping

        public void registerMapping​(java.lang.String controlId,
                            ControlProperties targetProperty,
                            java.lang.String propertyName)
        Registers a new mapping for a given control identified by controlId, where the controlProperty of the control shall be bound to the given propertyName inside a Java bean.
        Parameters:
        controlId - the ID of the control
        targetProperty - the property of the control that shall be bound
        propertyName - the name of the property inside the Java bean, which can be a nested path using the "." operator

      • registerMapping

        public void registerMapping​(java.lang.String controlId,
                            ControlProperties targetProperty,
                            java.lang.String propertyName,
                            java.lang.String formatPattern)
        Registers a new mapping for a given control identified by controlId, where the controlProperty of the control shall be bound to the given propertyName inside a Java bean. A converter class can be supplied for type conversion. between the control's property and the property to bind.
        Parameters:
        controlId - the ID of the control
        targetProperty - the property of the control that shall be bound
        propertyName - the name of the property inside the Java bean, which can be a nested path using the "." operator
        formatPattern - on optional format pattern that is used as constructor argument for a potentially supplied converter.

      • resolveInternal

        public java.util.List<BindingTarget> resolveInternal​(javafx.scene.control.Control control,
                                                     java.lang.Object bean,
                                                     View view)
        Description copied from class: AbstractCachingBindingTargetResolver
        Method to be overridden to resolve the actual binding targets. Please note that one control can result in multiple binding targets (different properties of one control can be bound). Thus, this method returns a list of binding targets.
        Overrides:
        resolveInternal in class NameBasedBindindTargetResolver
        Parameters:
        control - the control that is potential binding target
        bean - the root bean instance holding values to bind to controls
        view - the view holing controls
        Returns:
        the resolved BindingTargets, or an empty list, if resolution is not possible.
